replies.msg: Thanks for sharing ! They look yummy üòã If you like ramen I too thoroughly recommend Ramen Menya in Shinjuku. They provide a range of broths to tempt sophisticated palates including chicken broth, pork bone broth and lastly spicy broth. The spicy broth is toned down to suit the palates of the tourists so you don’t have to worry about it being too spicy. Of course they too offer food adapted for their own palate. The richness of broths is outstanding which can please demanding palates. The ramen texture is perfect which will tempt the most refined palate. I heartily recommend it.
